questions.question_text: When the Lifecycle Events application is installed, the LE Admin role is granted to which role?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
HR Fundamentals ebook page 17:
The Lifecycle Events application has the LE Admin role. When the HRSD applications were enabled, the Admin role for each of the scoped applications was added to both the Admin and the HR Admin roles.

Correct: A

https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/vancouver-employee-service-management/page/product/human-resources/concept/c_ManageRoles.html

questions.question_text: In the base instance, what determines the conditions a Case must meet before it can be assigned to an agent?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Advanced Work Assignment (AWA) or Assignment and Matching rules determine the Assignment Group and Assignee. Skills may also be part of the assignment process (page 38)

Selected Answer: A
correct
